Class PostgresToDoDAO

java.lang.Object
daopostgresimplementation.PostgresToDoDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ToDoDAO
public class PostgresToDoDAO extends Object implements ToDoDAO

PostgreSQL specific implementation of the ToDoDAO interface.

      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID

      Adds a ToDo to the system.

      Specified by:
      addToDo in interface ToDoDAO
      Parameters:
      todo - the corresponding ToDoDTO object
      boardID - the target Noticeboard's ID
      boardIndex - the target index in the Noticeboard
      Returns:
      the ToDo's ID if successful, otherwise returns -1.
